body.p: When you open the diagram for the first time, there are a few components to become familiar with.

li.p: The New DMN Editor empty state enables you to easily bootstrap a new model via two options: by creating a Decision node with a Decision Table or by creating a Decision with an Input Data node.
The node Palette which enables you to create:

ol.li: The DRD dropdown which enables you to change the currently open DRD, rename it, or change its properties.
The properties panel of the selected element.
The overlay panel, with customizable style and visualization properties.
The auto layout button, to help you organize your DRD.
The canvas properties, where you can control the zoom or what you are visualizing.

body.p: More about these functionalities are explained in the following sections.
